Post checklist:

- [ ] YAML: permalink
- [ ] YAML: excerpt
- [ ] YAML: description
- [ ] YAML: author
- [ ] YAML: toc label
- [ ] YAML: nav sidebar
- [ ] Ran Grammarly?
- [ ] Added some images?
- [ ] SEO: keywords in title, description, first 100 words
- [ ] image have alt and title att?
- [ ] no h1 header except title
- [ ] Ran local test?
- [ ] All links work?
- [ ] Date correct?
- [ ] Squashed commits?
